title: Brakhage / Blonde Redhead
content:
This lettering is used for titles in at least one film by Stan Brakhage. I've also seen it used for promotional materials for the band Blonde Redhead. Therefore, I'm led to believe that it may be available as a font... Any ideas?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414055302im_/http:/typophile.com/files/brakhage_3504.jpg)
author: Jonathan Clede

comments.content:
This is almost certainly hand lettered. The font on the Blonde Redhead site is different - is this the one you mean (tour dates)?

[http://www.blonde-redhead.com/tour.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414055302/http:/www.blonde-redhead.com/tour.html "http://www.blonde-redhead.com/tour.html")

That font is called Ambrosia, and it's a freebie

[http://www.getfreefonts.info/free\_font.ambrosia.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414055302/http:/www.getfreefonts.info/free_font.ambrosia.html "http://www.getfreefonts.info/free\_font.ambrosia.html")

No, I'm not thinking of Ambrosia. Here's one piece using that same text style... I suppose they both may be handlettered, or maybe they just appropriated the letterforms from the Brakhage film.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414055302im_/http:/typophile.com/files/blonde_redhead_6342.jpg)
